item.description:
With the help of the Boston Chihuahua organizer, Susan, DoggieDay is in search of Boston?s cutest Meet-up Pup! To enter, please fill out an application at meet-up and submit it with your pup?s ?best? photo.

Each pup that wins cutest in their meet-up group will then move on to the ?DoggieDay Meet-up Pup? finals. The pup to win the title of ?DoggieDay Meet-up Pup? will receive a complimentary birthday party for them and 9 of their closest puppy friends. The birthday will be held during the week of their birthday on a date chosen by the dog?s guardian. DoggieDay will send out the invites, track the RSVP?s, set your pup up on ?sPoochies Gift Registry, provide the puppy cake, goodie bags for the four-legged attendees, the decorations and all you have to do is show up for the soire.

In addition, all pups, who are finalists, may be approached to participate in various events we host throughout the year. Events include fashion shows, calendars, TV appearances, commercials and documentaries.

Below are the following meet-ups that you can register at. Also, please RSVP for the meetups. You must be a group member to join the contest. To join the group, please go to www.meetup.com. There is no fee to join meetup or the group. We do rely on RSVP?s to reserve space for each group.

Boston Boston Terriers Saturday, March 10, 2007 10am-12noon
French Bulldogs Saturday, March 10, 2007 1pm-3pm
Boston Chihuahua Sunday, March 11, 2007 11am-1pm
Downtown Boston Maltese Saturday, March 17, 2007 10am-12noon
Boston Yorkshire Terriers Saturday, March 17, 2007 1pm-3pm
Boston Little Yorkies Sunday, March 18, 2007 1pm-3pm
Boston Italian Greyhounds Sunday, March 25, 2007 10am-12noon
Jack Russell Saturday, March 31, 2007 1pm-3pm
Boston mini-mutts Sunday, April 1, 2007 10am-12noon
Boston Middi-mutts Sunday, April 1, 2007 1pm-3pm
Boston Pug Saturday, April 7, 2007 10am-12noon
item.name: The Downtown Boston Maltese Meetup March Meetup
